comments: Great teacher. He makes college English fun which is not easy to do. His class is really laid back. Will look over your papers and tell you what to fix to make it impossible to not get an A. Write your papers and you are good. You never stay the full length of class besides the first two classes.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Caring (4)  Inspirational (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: He can be very honest and intimidating at times but hes a really cool guy. He wants everyone to succeed and helps you on all of your papers. His class is an easy A as long as you turn in all of your assignments on time. BE PREPARED he will not hesitate to yell at you and kick you out of class for not having an assignment.

comments: LaSalle is a great professor. He makes the class exciting, and really wants to see you succeed. He will help proof read your papers to make sure you get the best grade possible. I would definitely take his class again.

comments: This class was very good if you were organized and kept up calendar of due dates for assignments. He gives wonderful feedback and will always be willing to work you after class fro extra help. If you don\'t mind lectures and not having to take many notes. This would be a great class for you. The only thing I recommend is to be prepared for class.

comments: I had him for 111 as well. Last year he was very stern & discipline. After the incident he had in his class, this year he is much better. All he wants is for you to do your best & show up for class. He is very helpful & as long as you do the work. Be sure to ask questions & have a dictionary handy.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Caring (4)  Inspirational (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Prof LaSalle is very helpful and wants you to succeed and pass with confidence. I am not good with writing but he completely explains everything so you understand it. He will come around and sit in your seat to help you edit your papers and offers tremendous advise. Highly recommend his class. Be sure you respect his classroom rules. I got an A!
